content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Welcome to Software Testing Division!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/fd98aa52-5abd-4ef5-a3a9-ab6d3156e709/image2020-3-11_16-6-26.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":804,\"height\":175}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Software Testing Division module will help you to take a closer look at your new team's history, traditions, and internal processes and realize the opportunities it offers.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d89fd3f7-bf8b-4526-b46c-f1e718de27f7/image2020-3-11_16-8-59.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":765,\"height\":385}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This is when cooperation with the country's leading universities – BSUIR, BNTU and BSEU – started. Professors gave a testing course available for all fourth- and fifth-year students. The brightest students joined the EPAM testing team as interns. This initiative was a starting point for the Resource and Development Department or, EPAM Labs, which these days prepare dozens of testing engineers per year.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A full version of the Software Testing Division's history can be found here (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://login.epam.com/adfs/ls/?SAMLRequest=fZJbSwMxEIX%2FypL3vbb2EroLvUKhSmnVB18kpLM2kMuaSar%2Be7NbtBWkEAhMzsl8Z5IJMiUbOvXuqHfw7gFd9KmkRtodlMRbTQ1DgVQzBUgdp%2Fvp%2FYYWSUYba5zhRpIry20HQwTrhNEkWi9K8pr18%2Fmyn81Hw8VsPCtGvVVYeX82mPYGw%2BHdkkTPYDHoSxLswYToYa3RMe1CKcuHcVbERe8xG9EirPELiRYhg9DMda6jcw3SNJXmTegEGqYSblTKDjWmElMSzY1GaC%2B7hc3PIsq9tWGPhWqk4MKRaGUsh256JamZRGgZtyGmOMFvZfqTum3mFdg92JPg8LTbXAiFrs0FUIGURqeNQbcDbNr%2BpJq0A6bdDGz1r2%2BSXksm58d9CHnWi60JyF8tsGI34uZJ3lXEIa47KfUaG%2BCiFnAIUQLWx9wCcyGesx5IWp2b%2Fv1E1Tc%3D&RelayState=https%3A%2F%2Finfo.epam.com%2Findepartment%2Fstd%2Fdepartment-news%2Fcommunity%2F2015%2Fstd-history--part-1-.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Part 1\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/indepartment/std/department-news/community/2016/software-testing-division-history--part-2-.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Part 2\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\").\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
